::Blacknightmare/Darkfate::

Darkfate spoke thourgh the bat probe again "I've almost arrived I'll 
give more troops when It happen and the rest will take position in 
order to nobody take us by surprice"

Blacknighmare said at Killfest "I'm new here... Just show me who's 
the enemie in order to star to shot" and looked at Darkmouse "Exit 
any backwards door that my leader's troop can use.. and I sugest that 
we shhould trace the enemie"
 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Megatron, Hell Beast, Inferno, Tankkor, Rampage, Paralysis, 
Nighteyes, 
> Paddletail, Aquarious, Aerostreak, Adrax, and Waspinator take arms 
and stand 
> ready in the strong hold they have taken as thier temporary 
headquarters, 
> until they regain control of the ship.
>        "Good, excellent thinking Paralysis. This is an excellent 
stronghold. 
> The engin room...if they want to keep any kind of power I suggest 
they 
> surrender to us. But for now I want to talk to Killfest and 
Drillbit." 
> Megatron said as he gazed into a monitor.
>        Paralysis brought up a visual comm and gave the go sign to 
Megatron. 
> "Killfest, you digusting a loathsome vermine, I dont know what 
youre trying 
> to pull but If you dont get out of my ship, not only will I cut all 
power off 
> to you and your men, including the inviormental controls, I will 
flood the 
> bridge and corridors with the exhust from the Transwarp engins. 
True, 
> transformers dont need to breath, but you know as well as I do that 
it will 
> strip your armor off in a matter of seconeds, leaving you a 
pathetic pile of 
> scrap where your spark will fizzle out." He smiled even more, "And 
from here 
> I also have access into the mainframe computer, so this whole 
lockdown thing 
> isnt going to last for to long. I expect a message from you in no 
less than 
> 30 minutes. If you dont respond I will flood this ship. Commander 
Megatron 
> out." He said finally and turned off the visual link.
>        "Very well done Megatron. Rampage, go and begin to churn the 
exhust 
> from the engines, I want to expell it at a moments notice. As for 
the rest of 
> you, be wary, they will most likely try to get inside here, even 
though there 
> is a lockdown." Hell Beast said making himslef comfortable.
> 
>        Tarantulas sped through the corridors as fast as his vhicle 
mode would 
> allow. The internal autoguns did fire apon him, but the shots that 
did hit 
> him did little to slow him down. The mech he was bleeding was a 
small wound 
> that could actually be delt with manually.
>        Reaching his destination he transformed and ducked under the 
> crossfire. Taking out a lockpick he carefully inserted it into the 
door tech 
> lock and poped it open after a few minuted off password tag. He 
stepped 
> inside and locked it agian behinde him. He walked over to the pod 
where the 
> remains of Kitkat lay. The bitch was getting payback.
>        After ripping the wires from the pod, the ones responsable 
for keeping 
> the cloning process going, he ripped open the lid, took the 
remains, and 
> chucked them over his shoulder. He turned and left the lab, the 
doors open 
> this time, and raced down that hallway, taking a hit in the 
shoulder that 
> hindered him but a minute.
>        Apon reaching the engin room doors, rather large, thick 
doors, he saw 
> Inferno waiting to let him in. He pushed through and the heavy iron 
doors 
> shut quickly, air tight. He saw his fellow commrads around him as 
he dumped 
> her reamins on the floor.
>        "Well done arachnid!" Megatron said as he came closer. "If 
they want 
> her back, they will negotiate. Otherwise Were going to pump he 
preety little 
> corpse with enough ammo to make her look like she went through the 
exhaust 
> process. Which, we might do anywas. Hahaha." He mused to himslef as 
he poked 
> her with his tail cannon gun.
> 
>        Black Aracnia looked to Quasar. They were only down the hall 
from the 
> rebels. If they found her and her daughter, you could bet she would 
live very 
> much longer.
>        "Quasar, transform into beast mode and go into the hallwasy. 
I want 
> you to run as fast as you can to the engin room. Thats the only 
room as 
> important as the bridge and I can bet Megatron is holding up there. 
Take 
> these directions if you get lost. Im going to find Quickstrike." 
She said, 
> her eyes beginning to fill with tears from the worry she was 
under. "Just 
> promise me you wont stop for anything, because if you do youre as 
good as 
> dead."
> 
>        The Predacons, under Megatron, were armed, and had been 
waiting to 
> fight for a long while. Kitkats plan to attack the Allience had 
taken to 
> long, thus the high tension they were having now. Once these rebel 
Predacons 
> were delt with Megatron planned on making a few alliences of his 
own. But for 
> now, Killfest, Drillbit, and that little bitch Darkmouse were the 
top targets 
> on his agenda.
